name: kiichain-lahat-staking-bot
description: 🎪 Advanced Multi-Wallet Staking Bot for Kiichain Network - Pempek Lahat Technology

scripts.pempek-demo: echo '🎪 Starting Pempek Lahat Demo...' && node enhanced-main.js demo
scripts.pempek-test: echo '🧪 Pempek Test Mode...' && node enhanced-main.js test
scripts.pempek-live: echo '🔥 Pempek Live Mode...' && node enhanced-main.js live
scripts.pempek-bulk: echo '🚀 Pempek Bulk Mode...' && node enhanced-main.js bulk-live
scripts.pempek-custom: echo '📊 Pempek Custom Mode...' && node enhanced-main.js custom-live
scripts.setup-env:
echo 'WALLET_1=your_private_key_here
WALLET_1_NAME=Main Wallet
WALLET_2=
WALLET_2_NAME=Trading Wallet' > .env.example
scripts.help:
echo '
🎪 KIICHAIN LAHAT BOT COMMANDS:
' && echo '  npm run demo     - Full demo mode' && echo '  npm run test     - Quick test' && echo '  npm run live     - Interactive staking' && echo '  npm run bulk     - Bulk stake all' && echo '  npm run custom   - Custom sessions' && echo '  npm run balances - Show balances' && echo '  npm run config   - Show config
'
scripts.validate: node -e "console.log('🔍 Validating configuration...'); try { require('./enhanced-main.js'); console.log('✅ Configuration valid!'); } catch(e) { console.log('❌ Error:', e.message); }"

author: Pempek Lahat Technology
